item.title: AWS 与 Aumovio 共同拓展人工智能驱动的自动驾驶汽车开发
item.description: 亚马逊云计算部门与德国汽车硬件供应商 Aumovio 合作，为自动驾驶汽车的商业推广提供支持。【原文：Amazon's cloud unit has partnered with German automotive hardware supplier Aumovio to support the commercial rollout of self-driving vehicles, starting with Aurora's autonomous trucks, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国需求强劲，供应紧缩，Meta 推迟雷朋显示眼镜的全球推广计划
item.description: Meta 公司周二表示，由于供应短缺和美国市场的强劲需求，该公司已决定暂停雷朋显示眼镜的国际扩张。【原文：Meta said on Tuesday it has decided to pause international expansion of its Ray-Ban Display glasses due to short supply and strong demand in the United States.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉输往亚洲的石油处于停滞状态，雪佛龙公司的出口却源源不断--航运数据
item.description: 航运数据显示，由于美国通过石油禁运向委内瑞拉施压，委内瑞拉的主要石油港口周二已进入第五天没有向国营的委内瑞拉石油公司（PDVSA）在亚洲的客户交付原油，而亚洲客户是这个欧佩克国家的主要买家。【原文：Venezuela's main oil ports on Tuesday entered their fifth day without delivering crude for state-run PDVSA's customers in Asia, which are the OPEC country's main buyers, shipping data showed, as the U.S. presses the nation through an oil embargo.】

item.title: Variant Bio 推出人工智能平台，利用基因数据发现新药
item.description: 私营生物技术公司Variant Bio周二表示，该公司已推出一个平台，利用人工智能基因数据发现新的候选药物，并将其送入人体试验阶段。【原文：Variant Bio, a private biotech firm, said on Tuesday it has launched a platform that uses artificial intelligence on genetic data to discover new drug candidates to send into human trials.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称美国面临央行两项任务的风险
item.description: 里士满联储主席汤姆-巴尔金（Tom Barkin）周二表示，鉴于美联储失业率和通胀目标面临的风险，美国联邦储备委员会利率的进一步变化将需要根据新的数据进行 "微调"。【原文：Further U.S. Federal Reserve interest rate changes will need to be "finely tuned" to incoming data given risks to both the Fed's unemployment and inflation goals, Richmond Fed president Tom Barkin said on Tuesday.】

item.title: AIG 首席执行官扎菲诺将卸任并转任执行董事长
item.description: 美国国际集团周二表示，首席执行官彼得-扎菲诺（Peter Zaffino）将于今年年中卸任，转而担任董事会执行主席。【原文：American International Group said on Tuesday CEO Peter Zaffino will step down by mid-year and move into the role of executive chair of the board.】

item.title: Grab 收购人工智能机器人公司 Infermove 以增强配送能力
item.description: 新加坡 Grab 控股公司表示，它已收购了中国的人工智能机器人解决方案开发商 Infermove，以加强其首站和最后一公里配送能力。【原文：Singapore's Grab Holdings said it has acquired China-based Infermove, a developer of AI-enabled robotics solutions, to strengthen its first- and last-mile delivery capabilities.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利预测 2026 年第四季度黄金价格为 4,800 美元
item.description: 摩根士丹利预测，到今年第四季度，黄金价格将达到每盎司4800美元，超过去年的记录，理由是利率下降、美联储领导层更迭以及央行和基金的买盘。【原文：Morgan Stanley forecast gold would hit $4,800 per ounce by the fourth quarter of this year, exceeding last year's records, citing falling interest rates, a change in leadership at the Federal Reserve, and buying by central banks and funds.】

item.title: 中国购买更多美国大豆，总购买量接近 1,000 万吨
item.description: 三位交易商周二告诉路透社，中国国家粮食储备公司（Sinograin）本周购买了 10 批美国大豆，因为在 10 月底达成贸易休战协议后，中国这个世界头号买家将继续从美国购买大豆。【原文：China's state stockpiler Sinograin bought 10 U.S. soybean cargoes this week, three traders told Reuters on Tuesday, as the world's top buyer continues purchasing from the United States following a late-October trade truce.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉债务反弹掩盖了复杂的债权网和政治泥潭
item.description: 在经历了近十年的违约困境之后，美国解除委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯-马杜罗的职务，使债务重组从遥不可及的希望变成了债券持有人的现实可能，从而推动了委内瑞拉债券的反弹。【原文：After nearly a decade of default limbo, the U.S. removal of Venezuela's Nicolas Maduro has turned debt restructuring from a distant hope into a real possibility for bondholders, fuelling a rally in its bonds.】

item.title: 电动汽车制造商 VinFast 的越南交付量在 2025 年将翻一番
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 周二表示，预计去年将在该国交付约 17 万辆电动汽车。【原文：Vietnamese electric-vehicle maker VinFast said on Tuesday it expects to have delivered about 170,000 units in the country last year.】

item.title: 投资者在反弹后暂停投资，华尔街期货走势低迷
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货走势平淡，投资者在华尔街上一交易日创下数周来最大盘中涨幅后稍事喘息，同时市场为本周数据密集的劳工报告做好准备。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Tuesday as investors took a breather after Wall Street posted its biggest intraday gains in weeks in the previous session, while markets braced for a data-heavy week of labor reports.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利申请推出比特币和索拉纳 ETF，推动数字资产发展
item.description: 根据周二向美国证券交易委员会提交的文件，摩根士丹利正在寻求监管部门批准推出与加密货币代币价格挂钩的交易所交易基金。【原文：Morgan Stanley is seeking regulatory approval to launch exchange-traded funds tied to the price of cryptocurrency tokens, according to filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Tuesday.】

item.title: 调查显示，私募股权公司有望启动中型市场并购交易
item.description: Citizens Financial 对约 400 家公司进行的调查显示，随着私募股权公司更愿意进行交易，中型企业的并购活动有望增加。【原文：M&A activity is expected to rise among midsize companies as private equity firms become more willing to do deals, according to a Citizens Financial survey of about 400 companies.】

item.title: 早间竞标迅速向前
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 各国政府和监管机构加强对 DeepSeek 的审查
item.description: 中国人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 今年 1 月表示，它已经开发出一种人工智能模型，可以与 ChatGPT 相媲美，而且成本更低。【原文：Chinese AI startup DeepSeek, which said in January it had developed an AI model to rival ChatGPT at much lower cost, has come under scrutiny in some countries for its security policies and privacy practices.】

item.title: 解说员：全球监管机构如何软化银行资本规则
item.description: 全球金融危机已过去 17 年，监管机构正在削减银行的繁文缛节，以保持贷款机构的竞争力并刺激经济。【原文：Seventeen years on from the global financial crisis, regulators are cutting red tape for their banks in a bid to keep lenders competitive and stimulate their economies.】

item.title: 中国流行超市在全球扩张中扩大供应链
item.description: 中国玩具制造商流行玛特公司（Pop Mart）表示，该公司已在墨西哥、柬埔寨和印度尼西亚增设了生产设施，以扩大供应网络，满足激增的全球需求。【原文：Chinese toymaker Pop Mart has added manufacturing facilities in Mexico, Cambodia and Indonesia as it broadens its supply network to meet surging global demand, the company said.】

item.title: 日本小企业游说团体敦促政府采取行动应对通胀
item.description: 一个代表中小型企业的商业游说团体的负责人周二表示，该团体敦促政府解决通货膨胀问题，包括日元的疲软，并称这对实现实际工资增长至关重要。【原文：A business lobby representing small and midsize firms urged the government to address inflation, including the yen's weakness, saying this was essential to achieving real wage growth, its chief said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 2025 年最后一个季度宝马在美国的销量下滑
item.description: 德国汽车制造商宝马公司报告称，由于电动汽车需求进一步减弱，2025 年第四季度在美国的销量下降了 3.4%。【原文：German carmaker BMW reported a 3.4% decline in sales in the United States in the fourth quarter of 2025 as demand for electric vehicles weakened further.】

item.title: 菲律宾 Jollibee 计划分拆国际业务并在美国上市
item.description: Jollibee Foods Corp 周二在提交给菲律宾证券交易所的文件中表示，该公司计划分拆其国际业务，并将新部门作为一家独立公司在美国证券交易所上市。【原文：Jollibee Foods Corp plans to spin off its international operations and list the new unit as an independent company on a U.S. securities exchange, it said in a filing with the Philippine Stock Exchange on Tuesday.】

item.title: 大众汽车因后视摄像头故障召回超过 35.66 万辆美国汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周二表示，由于软件错误可能导致后视摄像头图像显示问题，大众汽车将在美国召回356649辆汽车。【原文：Volkswagen is recalling 356,649 vehicles in the U.S. due to a software error that can lead to problems displaying the rearview camera image, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: DayOne 数据中心融资超过 20 亿美元，为欧洲和亚洲扩张提供资金
item.description: DayOne Data Centers 在周一晚些时候发表的一份声明中表示，该公司已就其 C 轮股权融资达成了超过 20 亿美元的最终协议，由现有投资者 Coatue 领投，印尼投资局等机构参投。【原文：DayOne Data Centers has entered into definitive agreements for over $2.0 billion in its series C equity financing, led by existing investor Coatue with participation including Indonesia Investment Authority, it said in a statement on late Monday.】

item.title: 政府小组成员敦促日本央行将通胀预期锚定在 2% 左右
item.description: 前日本央行副行长若田部昌三目前是一个重要政府小组的成员，他在该小组上个月的会议上被引述说，日本央行应制定政策，将长期通胀预期锚定在 2% 左右。【原文：The Bank of Japan should set policy to anchor long-term inflation expectations around 2%, former deputy governor Masazumi Wakatabe, who is currently a member of a key government panel, was quoted as saying at the panel's meeting last month.】

item.title: 百威英博以 30 亿美元回购美国金属容器厂股份
item.description: 世界顶级啤酒酿造商安海斯-布希英博公司（Anheuser-Busch InBev）周二表示，将以约 30 亿美元的价格回购其在美国的金属容器厂 49.9% 的股份。【原文：Anheuser-Busch InBev will buy back a 49.9% stake in its metal container plants in the United States for about $3 billion, the world's top brewer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：股市保持冷静，继续创新高
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 市场 2026 年观察清单：美联储继任、政治风险和人工智能
item.description: 地缘政治、美国中期选举和不同的货币政策是 2026 年世界市场的主要驱动因素，此外，人工智能的蓬勃发展也引发了对科技股泡沫的担忧。【原文：Geopolitics, U.S. midterm elections and diverging monetary policies are among key drivers for world markets in 2026, alongside an artificial intelligence boom that has raised concerns about a tech share bubble.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Hg Capital 接近达成将 OneStream 私有化的交易
item.description: 彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，收购公司 Hg Capital 正在就收购金融软件制造商 OneStream 进行深入谈判。【原文：Buyout firm Hg Capital is in advanced talks to acquire financial software maker OneStream , Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 索尼本田汽车公司在拉斯维加斯 CES 上推出新款电动车原型
item.description: 索尼本田汽车公司周一在拉斯维加斯举行的 CES 展会上推出了新款电动汽车原型，尽管大多数美国汽车制造商都在为电动汽车踩刹车。【原文：Sony Honda Mobility unveiled its new prototype electric vehicle at the CES trade show in Las Vegas on Monday, even as most U.S. automakers hit the brakes on EVs.】

item.title: AMD 在拉斯维加斯举行的 CES 上发布新款人工智能芯片
item.description: 周一，在拉斯维加斯举行的 CES 展会上，Advanced Micro Devices 首席执行官苏丽莎展示了公司的 MI455 GPU 芯片。【原文：Advanced Micro Devices CEO Lisa Su showed off the company's MI455 GPU chips on Monday at the CES trade show in Las Vegas.】
